title: LangChat Slides
waitingPlaceholder: Your generated slides will appear here
welcomeDesc: Start by describing the slides you want to create. Make sure to configure your API key first.
sendPlaceholder: Describe the slides you want to create...
aiSlidesDesc: Select a topic or enter your question, and AI will automatically create professional presentations for you
customInputTip: Tip: You can also directly enter a custom topic
presetQuestion2: AIGC Technology Frontiers and Development Trends
presetQuestion4: Global Climate Change and Sustainable Development
presetQuestion6: Best Practices in Cloud Architecture Design
customSlideDesc: Enter slide syntax in infographic format to add or replace slides
slideSyntaxPlaceholder:
Enter slide syntax, e.g.:

[slide]infographic list-row-horizontal-icon-arrow
data
  title My Slide
  desc Slide description
  items
    - label Item 1
      desc Description 1
      icon mdi/web
    - label Item 2
      desc Description 2
      icon mdi/star[/slide]
checkSyntax: Please check the syntax and try again
renderingFailed: Render failed, see console for details
